# webArchive

**Type Property**

A type that represents WebKit web archive data.

## Declaration

```swift
static var webArchive: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.webarchive`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeData] and [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeCompositeContent].

## Internet-specific

- **html**: A type that represents any version of HTML.
- **internetLocation**: A base type that represents an Apple internet location file.
- **internetShortcut**: A type that represents a Microsoft internet shortcut file.
